contentBlock.body:
Growth in the healthcare industry is accelerating—in products, markets, competitors, and regulations. Demands for expanded availability, cost reductions, product integrity and security, regulatory prowess, and operational/financial agility are amplified, with competing priorities. And when a patient's health depends on your package, this myriad of requirements has a deeper urgency.

Let the UPS team help solve your supply chain challenges—strategically, efficiently, and proactively. WIth 3,000 healthcare logistics experts and an established global infrastructure, we can rapidly customize and mobilize cutting-edge solutions for your time-, climate-, and mission-critical shipments.

detail.desc: Our flexible global transportation options and international trade expertise ensure that time-critical shipments cross borders rapidly and compliantly.
With a worldwide network of healthcare-compliant warehouses, we provide speed and agility, without the overhead.
Trust our innovative technology and processes to ensure the integrity of temperature-sensitive products—in transit, in storage, through distribution.
Team with our healthcare experts for supply chain design or optimization, supplier management, and integrated order fulfillment services.
Rely on our experience, systems, and technology to efficiently execute critical product recalls and streamline return processes.
Deploy our monitoring technology or engage our team to oversee high-value or sensitive shipments and intervene to protect your investment.
Take advantage of our expansive transportation network and expertise in trade management and customs compliance to turn obstacles into opportunities.
For direct-to-patient supply chains, we offer technology, flexibility, and tailored solutions to achieve your best patient experience.

banner.title: Find out how healthy logistics can position your business for success.
